text: Sir Derek George Jacobi CBE (born 22 October 1938) is a British actor. Jacobi was born in Leytonstone, London. He graduated from St John's College, Cambridge with a Master of Arts. Jacobi is openly gay and lives in Primrose Hill, London with his civil partner.I don't mind people having faith == References == == Other websites == * ==Other websites== Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from London Category:Alumni of the University of Cambridge Category:BAFTA Award winning actors Category:Emmy Award winning actors Category:English LGBT people Category:English movie actors Category:English stage actors Category:English television actors Category:English voice actors Category:Gay men Category:LGBT actors Category:Tony Award winning actors
title: Derek Jacobi
